messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Having to write?
messages.msgSnippet: ... is a ... with ... Because my oldest wanted it.  She wants to start college in the spring. See my previous answer for more detail. Bridget ~~~~If
messages.messageBody:
On Sun, 9 Sep 2001 08:53:28 EDT NumoAstro@... writes:

>
> Why? Why do you have to have guidelines if you are unschooling? This
is a
> question I'm serious about knowing the answer too, because I struggle
with
> this one myself.
>
> Dawn

Because my oldest wanted it. She wants to start college in the spring.
See my previous answer for more detail.

Bridget

~~~~If electricity comes from electrons...does that mean that morality
comes from morons?~~~~
I sent my Soul through the Invisible,
Some letter of that After-life to spell;
And by and by my Soul returned to me,
And answered, "I Myself am Heaven and Hell." -- The Rubaiyat

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Having to write?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Why?  Why do you have to have guidelines if you are unschooling?  This is a question I m serious about knowing the answer too, because I struggle with this
messages.messageBody:
> . I said we have in place some
> guidelines that include a certain amount of writing each week. Bridget]

Why? Why do you have to have guidelines if you are unschooling? This is a
question I'm serious about knowing the answer too, because I struggle with
this one myself.

Dawn
